name: suggest_email_recipients
description: Intelligently suggest email recipients based on context, patterns, and user behavior. Provides smart recipient suggestions with reasoning, considering thread participants, time patterns, subject analysis, and relationship mapping.

emailComponentId.description: The ID of the email component to provide suggestions for. If not provided, returns general suggestions.

query.description: Partial recipient query (email or name) to filter suggestions

subject.description: Email subject line for subject-based suggestions

threadParticipants.description: Email addresses of people already in the thread

timeOfDay.description: Hour of day (0-23) for time-based pattern matching

dayOfWeek.description: Day of week (0-6, Sunday=0) for day-based pattern matching

primaryRecipient.description: Primary TO recipient to suggest CC recipients based on relationships

emailBody.description: Email body text for content-based analysis

maxSuggestions.description: Maximum number of suggestions to return (default: 5)

includeGroups.description: Include auto-detected recipient groups in suggestions (default: true)

suggestCC.description: Suggest CC recipients based on TO recipients (default: false)

examples.description: Get recipient suggestions based on partial query
Get context-aware suggestions for a specific email with subject
Suggest CC recipients based on primary recipient
Get suggestions for people in a thread with subject analysis
